Text: The upload is slow, unfortunately. Please be patient and keep seeding afterwards. Thanks!

slow? I don't mind slow. But it looks like you have disappeared. We're stuck at 99.6% for several days, then no seed. 
Please come back. 
Delete the torrent (just the torrent, not the file) from your torrent client.
Then download it again from here. That might get it to finish. 
If you are still having trouble, email me. evanses at gmail.com

Sorry Candinot, I was travelling and after a power cut at home the upload stopped. Back now and will see whether we can finish it this way. Let me know if you remain stuck. Else email me at martin at mgbaltes dot com. My experience with uploading is minimal.
